cab.content: This Document is the Property of evacuation OF REFUGEES PROM ODESSA * The following is circulated for the Informationof the Cabinet i- The British Military Mission at Odessa has informed the Commander-in-Chief, Mediterranean, that it isessential to commence evacuation from Odessa immediately;that Schilling states he has permission to evacuate 8^000to Bulgaria and 8,000 to Serbia.? that the number compromisedby British and who must therefore be removed is 5,000,excluding wives of Volunteer officerso That oneHospital Ship will he necessary for sick and wounded. The Commander-in-Chief reports that In compli-ance with Cabinet decision he is taking no steps to embarkwomen and children whose fate is therefore uncertain.(Intlld)W. H. L.3 o 2 * 20 a
